00024   CALICE::ExtractConfigurationAverageProcessor<int, float, CALICE::FastCaliceHit>
00025       aExtractConfigurationAverageProcessor("ExtractConfigurationAverageProcessor", 
00026                                             &CALICE::FastCaliceHit::getCellID,
00027                                             &CALICE::FastCaliceHit::getEnergyValue);

00031   template<class KEY, class VALUE, class OBJECT_TO_AVERAGE>
00032   ExtractConfigurationAverageProcessor<KEY, 
00033                                        VALUE, 
00034                                        OBJECT_TO_AVERAGE>
00035   ::ExtractConfigurationAverageProcessor(const std::string name,
00036                                          PMF_KEY pmf_key,
00037                                          PMF_VALUE pmf_value
00038                                         ) :
00039     marlin::Processor(name),
00040     _defaultString( std::string( "None" ) ),
00041     _pmf_key(pmf_key),
00042     _pmf_value(pmf_value),
00043     _name(name)
00044 {
00045     _description = "description to come";
00046 
00047     registerProcessorParameter("InputCollection",
00048                                "Name of input collection of FastCaliceHits",
00049                                _inColName,
00050                                std::string("FastCaliceHits"));
00051 
00052     registerProcessorParameter( "OutputCollection",
00053                                 "Name of output collection in DB or LCIO file",
00054                                 _outColName,
00055                                 std::string( "average" ) );
00056 
00057     registerProcessorParameter( "OutputFile",
00058                                 "Define file name to store results to LCIO file",
00059                                 _outFileName,
00060                                 _defaultString );
00061 
00062     registerProcessorParameter( "DBInitString",
00063                                 "Define DB init in order to save to DB",
00064                                 _dbInit,
00065                                 _defaultString );
00066 
00067     registerProcessorParameter( "DBFolder",
00068                                 "Specify DB folder in order to save to DB",
00069                                 _dbFolder,
00070                                 _defaultString );
00071 
00072     registerProcessorParameter( "DBDescription",
00073                                 "String to describe database entry",
00074                                 _dbDescription,
00075                                 std::string( "Results from ExtractConfigurationAverageProcessor" ) );
00076   }

00079   ExtractConfigurationAverageProcessor<KEY, VALUE, OBJECT_TO_AVERAGE>::~ExtractConfigurationAverageProcessor(){
00080   }

00082   template<class KEY, class VALUE, class OBJECT_TO_AVERAGE>
00083   void ExtractConfigurationAverageProcessor<KEY, VALUE, OBJECT_TO_AVERAGE>::init(){
00084     printParameters();
00085 
00086     _from = lccd::LCCDPlusInf;
00087     _till = lccd::LCCDMinusInf;
00088   }
00089 
00090   template<class KEY, class VALUE, class OBJECT_TO_AVERAGE>
00091   void ExtractConfigurationAverageProcessor<KEY, VALUE, OBJECT_TO_AVERAGE>::processRunHeader( LCRunHeader *run )
00092   {
00093 
00094     RunInformation runInformation(run);
00095 
00096     _from = (runInformation.runStart()).timeStamp();
00097     _till = (runInformation.runEnd()).timeStamp();
00098 
00099     //  check whether to write to DB
00100     bool writeDB = false;
00101     if ( _dbInit != _defaultString && _dbFolder != _defaultString ) {
00102 
00103       writeDB = true;
00104       
00105     }
00106 
00107     streamlog_out_T(MESSAGE) << "Start of run: " << LCTime(_from).getDateString() << '\n'
00108                            << "end of run:   " << LCTime(_till).getDateString() << std::endl;
00109 
00110 
00111     if( (_from == 0 || _till == 0) && writeDB == true ) {
00112 
00113       throw std::runtime_error("Tries to write to DB with impossible from and till.");
00114       
00115     }
00116 
00117 
00118   }
00119 
00120  
00121   template<class KEY, class VALUE, class OBJECT_TO_AVERAGE>
00122   void ExtractConfigurationAverageProcessor<KEY, VALUE, OBJECT_TO_AVERAGE>::processEvent( LCEvent *evt ){
00123 
00124     //  read input collection from event
00125     LCCollection* inCol = 0;
00126     try{
00127       inCol = evt->getCollection( _inColName );
00128 
00129       //  loop over hits
00130       for( int i(0); i!=inCol->getNumberOfElements(); ++i ){
00131         OBJECT_TO_AVERAGE* obj = dynamic_cast<OBJECT_TO_AVERAGE*>( inCol->getElementAt(i) );
00132         if (obj){
00133           _averageObjects[(obj->*_pmf_key)()].addValue((obj->*_pmf_value)());
00134         }
00135       } //  hit loop
00136     } catch (DataNotAvailableException &err){
00137       //   use Marlin verbosity levels to print 'WARNING - doing nothing'
00138     }  // close: try to read and process input collection
00139   }
00140   
00141   template<class KEY, class VALUE, class OBJECT_TO_AVERAGE>
00142   void ExtractConfigurationAverageProcessor<KEY, VALUE, OBJECT_TO_AVERAGE>::end(){
00143     //  check whether to write Simple lcio file
00144     bool writeFile = false;
00145     if ( _outFileName != _defaultString ) 
00146       writeFile = true;
00147 
00148     //  check whether to write to DB
00149     bool writeDB = false;
00150     if ( _dbInit != _defaultString && _dbFolder != _defaultString ) 
00151       writeDB = true;
00152 
00153     if ( !writeFile && !writeDB ){
00154       //  print to screen/log in case neither storage to file/DB is chosen
00155       print( std::cout );
00156     } else {
00157       LCCollection* outCol = getCollection();
00158       if ( writeFile )
00159         writeSimpleFile( outCol );
00160       if ( writeDB )
00161         writeDBFolder( outCol );
00162     }
00163   }
00164   
00165   template<class KEY, class VALUE, class OBJECT_TO_AVERAGE>
00166   void ExtractConfigurationAverageProcessor<KEY, VALUE, OBJECT_TO_AVERAGE>::print( std::ostream& out ){
00167     for( AVM_iterator iter = _averageObjects.begin();
00168          iter != _averageObjects.end(); ++iter){
00169       HcalTileIndex cid((*iter).first);
00170       out << std::setw( 8 ) << cid.getModule() 
00171           << std::setw( 8 ) << cid.getChip() 
00172           << std::setw( 8 ) << cid.getChannel()
00173           << std::setw( 16 ) << (*iter).second.getMean() 
00174           << std::setw( 16 ) << (*iter).second.getRMS()
00175           << std::setw( 8 ) << (*iter).second.getNumberOfValues()
00176           << std::endl;
00177     }  // close: iterator over internal map
00178   }
00179 
00180   template<class KEY, class VALUE, class OBJECT_TO_AVERAGE>
00181   void ExtractConfigurationAverageProcessor<KEY, VALUE, OBJECT_TO_AVERAGE>::writeSimpleFile( LCCollection *col ){
00182 
00183     LCWriter* lcWrt = LCFactory::getInstance()->createLCWriter() ;
00184     
00185     lcWrt->open( _outFileName, LCIO::WRITE_NEW );
00186     LCEventImpl* evt = new LCEventImpl();
00187     evt->addCollection( col, _outColName );
00188     lcWrt->writeEvent( evt );
00189     lcWrt->flush();
00190     lcWrt->close();
00191     
00192   }
00193 
00194   template<class KEY, class VALUE, class OBJECT_TO_AVERAGE>
00195   void ExtractConfigurationAverageProcessor<KEY, VALUE, OBJECT_TO_AVERAGE>::writeDBFolder( LCCollection* col ){
00196     lccd::DBInterface db( _dbInit, _dbFolder, true );
00197     lccd::LCCDTimeStamp till = ( _till == lccd::LCCDPlusInf ) ? _till : _till+1;
00198     db.storeCollection( _from, till, col, _dbDescription );
00199   }
00200 
00201   template<class KEY, class VALUE, class OBJECT_TO_AVERAGE>
00202   LCCollection* ExtractConfigurationAverageProcessor<KEY, VALUE, OBJECT_TO_AVERAGE>::getCollection(){
00203     LCCollectionVec *col = new LCCollectionVec( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT );
00204     for( AVM_const_iterator iter = _averageObjects.begin();
00205          iter != _averageObjects.end(); ++iter ){
00206       SimpleValue* val = new SimpleValue( (*iter).first, 
00207                                           (*iter).second.getMean(), 
00208                                           (*iter).second.getRMS(), 
00209                                           (*iter).second.getNumberOfValues() );
00210       col->addElement( val );
00211     }
00212     return col;
00213   }
00214 
00215 }; // namespace CALICE
